frameDefinitions: A Speaker addresses a Proposal made by an Interlocutor, either agreeing to it or rejecting it.
A Cognizer has a relatively fixed positive or negative point of view towards an Issue.
A Recipient comes into possession of the Theme as a result of the joint action of the Donor and the Recipient.
An Agent attempts to achieve a Goal.
A Stimulus serves to bring about an emotion of mental stimulation in an Experiencer.
An Agent has an Attribute which can take different Values, and the Agent selects and then begins to use some Value for that Attribute.
frameExamples: They were <t>rebuffed</t> again in the larger city of Provo. CNI
In interviews , it seems like everyone is completely <t>against</t> this expenditure .
I <t>recieved</t> a box from him in the mail.
You will not easily find a more <t>absorbing</t> box-set of piano discs.
They scoff at their opponents and <t>assume</t> an air of superior knowledge
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Speaker</fen> is the person who communicates the reply or response.

This is the person who made the <fen>Proposal</fen> to the <fen>Speaker</fen> and to whom the <fen>Speaker</fen> communicates  their response. This frame element stands in for the <fen>Proposal</fen> and is only licensed when the <fen>Proposal</fen>  can be understood from the context.
The <fen>Proposal</fen> is the prior communication or action to which a response is given.
The time interval during which the <fen>Speaker</fen> makes their verbal response.
The location in which the <fen>Speaker</fen>  makes a verbal response.
The individual that holds an opinion on an <fen>Issue</fen> or Side.
The matter, usually concerning a course of action, which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has a positive or negative opinion about.
The party or individual (generally associated with a particular position on an <fen>Issue</fen>) that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has an opinion about.
An action taken by a <fen>Side</fen> or a view that the <fen>Side</fen> takes on an issue which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> either supports or opposes.
The time period during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has the indicated point of view towards the <fen>Issue</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> takes <fen>Side</fen>s on an <fen>Issue</fen> .
The person who acts to come into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The person who gives the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
The entity that changes possession, beginning in the possession of the <fen>Donor</fen> and ending up with the <fen>Recipient</fen>.
The time at which the <fen>Recipient</fen> comes into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The location at which the Recipient comes into possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> makes an attempt to achieve a <fen>Goal</fen>.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is what the <fen>Agent</fen> attempts to achieve.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the attempt occurs.
The place where an attempt is made.
The <fen>Experiencer</fen> is the person or sentient entity that experiences or feels the emotions.
The <fen>Stimulus</fen> is the person, event, or state of affairs that evokes the emotional response in the <fen>Experiencer</fen>.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Experiencer</fen>  can be described as having said emotion.
The <fen>Agent</fen> selects a <fen>Value</fen> for his/her <fen>Attribute</fen> and begins to use it.
The <fen>Attribute</fen> of the <fen>Agent</fen> can take on several <fen>Value</fen>s, selected by the <fen>Agent</fen> .
The <fen>Value</fen>, chosen and made effective by the <fen>Agent</fen>, specifies the <fen>Attribute</fen>.
The time period when the <fen>Agent</fen> selects and begins to put into effect the <fen>Value</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where the <fen>Agent</fen> has the <fen>Attribute</fen> which can take different <fen>Value</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>Iran</fex> on Saturday rejected Europe's proposal for ending the standoff over Tehran's nuclear program.

But senior SLN officials had rebuffed <fex>the man who is ever so willing to please
the guerrillas</fex>.
Dr. Carolyn Herrington has accepted <fex>our offer to become Dean of the College of Education</fex> .
This must make <fex>yesterday's</fex> Taliban rebuff all the more wounding.
Legislation that would have required smaller school districts to share administrators has been rebuffed repeatedly <fex>in the Oklahoma House of Representatives</fex>.
<fex>Last year</fex> she opposed the bill, but changed her mind after she received correspondence supporting the bill.
She received the package <fex>before the month was out</fex>.
<fex>On the bridge</fex> he attempted to put the wig on.
<fex>Some organizations, like the Sierra Club</fex>, have adopted a position of neutrality on US immigration policies.
The Council of Constance (1414-18) adopted conciliarism <fex>as a stance</fex>, hoping that it would permit the election of a pope acceptable to both Catholic factions.
He crammed his cap back again into his pocket and re-entered the office, assuming <fex>an air of absentmindedness</fex>.
<fex>On January 1, 2001</fex>, our nation will adopt the US dollar as our official currency.
